column4: can anyone help me with what seems to be a problem with ssh ?
anyone here have experience with svn over ssh?
only via sshfs
but I think you just say svn+ssh://...
or do you mean running/configuring a repository?
paste(bin) the error...
can you ssh into the host normally?
I guess I never thought of how.  This is a svn repo that I simply have access to, it sits at savanah
what's the repo url?
hmm... try checking out a different repo on savannah
over ssh?  because if I do just a standard svn on this repo it works fine
a standard svn?
what command?
might it be ssh keys not set up right?
that is possible, I wouldnt expect it to kick back a network error
makes sense...
can you tell me if anything with the 9.10 installation could block something in ssh
no idea, I run jaunty
you may be on to something with the keys, I messed up generating new keys
so it works now?
I have to generate a new key, and wait for savanah to update it
ah
